frontmatter.title: AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Lambda
frontmatter.description: The AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry now supports AWS managed Lambda layers. ADOT Lambda layers for AWS Lambda provides a plug and play user experience by automatically instrumenting a Lambda function, by packaging OpenTelemetry together with an out-of-the-box configuration for AWS Lambda and AWS X-Ray in an easy to setup  layer. Users can enable and disable OpenTelemetry for their Lambda function without changing code.
